Title: Customer Chats: Keith Carlson from Relativity at Microsoft Ignite 2024
Author: Microsoft Events
Description:
Join Rick Claus at Microsoft Ignite as he sits down with Keith from Relativity to explore the fascinating world of unstructured data in the legal industry. Discover how Relativity is revolutionizing the legal landscape by leveraging AI and advanced technologies to process vast amounts of diverse data types.

Here’s what you’ll learn: 00:23 - Relativity's role in managing and analyzing legal data 00:59 - The challenges of handling increasing data volumes and types 01:16 - The impact of generative AI on document analysis 01:46 - Relativity's partnership with Microsoft and use of Azure Data Lake Storage 02:25 - Innovations in AI and storage solutions for processing large-scale data

Keith shares valuable insights into how Relativity is addressing the evolving needs of the legal industry, including their efforts to process video files in near real-time and extract meaningful insights. With the mission, “Organize data. Discover the truth. Act on it.”  Relativity is pushing the boundaries of what’s possible in legal tech.

Speakers: Keith Carlson https://www.linkedin.com/in/kcarlson/ Rick Claus https://www.linkedin.com/in/rickclaus/
